item.description:
Come out and watch the lighted boat parade and the fireworks. About the fireworks locals are saying that the fireworks will be double this time since we missed them earlier this summer.

Boat Parade & Fireworks: Starting on the Annisquam river at 7:30PM. Moving south through the draw bridge around the inner harbor on to the outer harbor for giant fire works display. The parade starts at 7:30.

I have changed the time for this event for 4:30pm, so we can get a bite to eat and then head over to St. Peter's Park to watch the parade and fireworks. Why don't we try out Cameron's here's their website so you can see a few things on their menu http://www.cape-ann.c....

If you are not able to make it for dinner but plan on coming the the rest of the event please put in your RSVP "meet at the restaurant" or "meet at the park". So then we know where to look for you!

We look forward to seeing you! smile
item.how_to_find_us: I will be in front of the restaurant
item.name: Dinner, Lighted Boat Parade & Fireworks!!
